name: RGB Highway
description:
Run as far as you can along the subway line! Dodge missiles along the way and travel through randomly generated stations that affect your character palette

Having more or less of different colors changes your movement options
More red = more movement, Less red = more jumping
More blue = further dashes, Less blue = shorter cooldown between dashes

This game was made for the bored pixels jam 9

Tips

- The player hitbox tends to be very forgiving. You may be able to go closer to missiles than you think
- You're invulnerable while dashing

Credits

Ategon - Art, Coding, Menu Music 

Batterfingers - Game Music

Future

I had to cut out a ton of content from the jam build due to major time constraints. I may come back and revisit the idea in the future while adding in all the missing features.

Stuff I had to cut
- Global leaderboard
- Actual enemies instead of just missile spam
- An attack system
- Different characters and better differentiation between color stats
- Key rebinding
- Sound effects
- Most of the animations

*WARNING the downloadable versions have a bug that seems to cause some rapidly flashing lights at times
